Title: Relates to personal assistants in consumer directed personal assistance programs
Summary: Allows a person legally responsible for an eligible individual's care and support, an eligible individual's spouse or designated representative to be a personal assistant in a consumer directed personal assistance program where such person is the sole person responsible for the eligible individual's care and support.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-f, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to consumer directed personal assistance programs
